languages.text: "Извольте перебить, госпожа Вультур..." {n}Урбенд Драйвстем, губернатор Даргонуса, заметно нервничающий от вида вооруженных арбитров, все же горделиво поднимает голову.{/n} "Премного благодарны за то, как вы здесь нас собрали..." {n}Ударение на последнем слове не оставляет сомнений, что сборы дворян во Дворце были недобровольными.{/n} "Однако все это, что сейчас здесь происходило, не меняет основ. Династия фон Валанциус владеет Торговым Патентом. Династия фон Валанциус — род Вольных Торговцев, и это не изменит никакая тяжба! Род Драйвстем верен Вольному Торговцу".

"If I might interrupt, Mistress Vultur..." {n}Urbend Drivestem, governor of Dargonus, visibly nervous at the sight of the armed Arbitrators, nevertheless raises his head haughtily.{/n} "We are much obliged to you for arranging this gathering..." {n}The emphasis on the last word leaves no doubt that the nobles' presence at the Palace is involuntary.{/n} "However, all that has now taken place here does not change the facts. House von Valancius holds the Warrant of Trade. House von Valancius is a Rogue Trader dynasty, and no amount of legal contortions will change that! House Drivestem is loyal to the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Извольте перебить, госпожа Вультур..." {n}Урбенд Драйвстем, губернатор Даргонуса, заметно нервничающий от вида вооруженных арбитров, все же горделиво поднимает голову.{/n} "Премного благодарны за то, как вы здесь нас собрали..." {n}Ударение на последнем слове не оставляет сомнений, что сборы дворян во Дворце были недобровольными.{/n} "Однако все это, что сейчас здесь происходило, не меняет основ. Династия фон Валанциус владеет Торговым Патентом. Династия фон Валанциус — род Вольных Торговцев, и это не изменит никакая тяжба! Род Драйвстем верен Вольному Торговцу".

House von Valancius holds the Warrant of Trade. House von Valancius is a Rogue Trader dynasty, and no amount of legal contortions will change that! House Drivestem is loyal to the Lord Captain."

"If I might interrupt, Mistress Vultur..." {n}Urbend Drivestem, governor of Dargonus, visibly nervous at the sight of the armed Arbitrators, nevertheless raises his head haughtily.{/n} "We are much obliged to you for arranging this gathering..." {n}The emphasis on the last word leaves no doubt that the nobles' presence at the Palace is involuntary.{/n} "However, all that has now taken place here does not change the facts. House von Valancius holds the Warrant of Trade. House von Valancius is a Rogue Trader dynasty, and no amount of legal contortions will change that! House Drivestem is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: "Wenn ich Euch kurz unterbrechen dürfte, Meisterin Vultur ..." {n}Urbend Drivestem, der Gouverneur von Dargonus, ist angesichts der bewaffneten Arbitratoren sichtlich nervös, hebt aber dennoch stolz seinen Kopf.{/n} "Wir sind Euch sehr dankbar für die Einberufung dieser Versammlung ..." {n}Die Betonung des letzten Wortes lässt keinen Zweifel offen, dass die Adeligen nicht freiwillig im Palast sind.{/n} "Allerdings ändert nichts, was hier gesagt wurde, die Fakten. Haus von Valancius ist im Besitz des Handelsbriefs. Haus von Valancius ist eine Dynastie von Freihändlern, das wird keine Rechtsverdrehung ändern! Haus Drivestem ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben."
languages.original_text: "If I might interrupt, Mistress Vultur..." {n}Urbend Drivestem, governor of Dargonus, visibly nervous at the sight of the armed Arbitrators, nevertheless raises his head haughtily.{/n} "We are much obliged to you for arranging this gathering..." {n}The emphasis on the last word leaves no doubt that the nobles' presence at the Palace is involuntary.{/n} "However, all that has now taken place here does not change the facts. House von Valancius holds the Warrant of Trade. House von Valancius is a Rogue Trader dynasty, and no amount of legal contortions will change that! House Drivestem is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich Euch kurz unterbrechen dürfte, Meisterin Vultur ..." {n}Urbend Drivestem, der Gouverneur von Dargonus, ist angesichts der bewaffneten Arbitratoren sichtlich nervös, hebt aber dennoch stolz seinen Kopf.{/n} "Wir sind Euch sehr dankbar für die Einberufung dieser Versammlung ..." {n}Die Betonung des letzten Wortes lässt keinen Zweifel offen, dass die Adeligen nicht freiwillig im Palast sind.{/n} "Allerdings ändert nichts, was hier gesagt wurde, die Fakten. Haus von Valancius ist im Besitz des Handelsbriefs. Haus von Valancius ist eine Dynastie von Freihändlern, das wird keine Rechtsverdrehung ändern! Haus Drivestem ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben."

languages.text: « Si je puis me permettre de vous interrompre, maîtresse Vultur... {n}Urbend Drivestem, le gouverneur de Dargonus rendu manifestement nerveux par la présence des arbitrators en armes, n'en relève pas moins la tête d'un air hautain.{/n} Nous vous sommes reconnaissants d'avoir convoqué cette assemblée... {n}Le ton employé ne laisse aucun doute sur le fait que la présence des nobles au palais est involontaire.{/n} Tout ce qui s'est passé jusqu'ici ne change cependant rien aux faits. La maison von Valancius est détentrice de la lettre de marque. La maison von Valancius est une dynastie de libres-marchands et aucun argumentaire légal n'y changera quoi que ce soit ! La maison Drivestem est loyale {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "If I might interrupt, Mistress Vultur..." {n}Urbend Drivestem, governor of Dargonus, visibly nervous at the sight of the armed Arbitrators, nevertheless raises his head haughtily.{/n} "We are much obliged to you for arranging this gathering..." {n}The emphasis on the last word leaves no doubt that the nobles' presence at the Palace is involuntary.{/n} "However, all that has now taken place here does not change the facts. House von Valancius holds the Warrant of Trade. House von Valancius is a Rogue Trader dynasty, and no amount of legal contortions will change that! House Drivestem is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Si je puis me permettre de vous interrompre, maîtresse Vultur... {n}Urbend Drivestem, le gouverneur de Dargonus rendu manifestement nerveux par la présence des arbitrators en armes, n'en relève pas moins la tête d'un air hautain.{/n} Nous vous sommes reconnaissants d'avoir convoqué cette assemblée... {n}Le ton employé ne laisse aucun doute sur le fait que la présence des nobles au palais est involontaire.{/n} Tout ce qui s'est passé jusqu'ici ne change cependant rien aux faits. La maison von Valancius est détentrice de la lettre de marque. La maison von Valancius est une dynastie de libres-marchands et aucun argumentaire légal n'y changera quoi que ce soit ! La maison Drivestem est loyale {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: “请允许我打断您一下，沃尔图尔女士……”{n}面对着全副武装的法务官，达戈努斯总督厄本·德莱夫斯塔显然有些紧张，但依然傲慢地昂起了头。{/n}“我们非常感谢您安排了这场聚会……”{n}他着重强调了最后几个字。毫无疑问，在场的所有贵族都是被强行叫到这里的。{/n}“不过，法庭发生的一切都无法改变以下事实——冯·瓦兰修斯家族是神圣贸易授状的持有者，同时也是帝国的行商浪人王朝，哪怕是再多的法律条款，也无法扭曲这个事实！德莱夫斯塔家族永远都是行商浪人忠诚的支持者。”
languages.original_text: "If I might interrupt, Mistress Vultur..." {n}Urbend Drivestem, governor of Dargonus, visibly nervous at the sight of the armed Arbitrators, nevertheless raises his head haughtily.{/n} "We are much obliged to you for arranging this gathering..." {n}The emphasis on the last word leaves no doubt that the nobles' presence at the Palace is involuntary.{/n} "However, all that has now taken place here does not change the facts. House von Valancius holds the Warrant of Trade. House von Valancius is a Rogue Trader dynasty, and no amount of legal contortions will change that! House Drivestem is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我打断您一下，沃尔图尔女士……”{n}面对着全副武装的法务官，达戈努斯总督厄本·德莱夫斯塔显然有些紧张，但依然傲慢地昂起了头。{/n}“我们非常感谢您安排了这场聚会……”{n}他着重强调了最后几个字。毫无疑问，在场的所有贵族都是被强行叫到这里的。{/n}“不过，法庭发生的一切都无法改变以下事实——冯·瓦兰修斯家族是神圣贸易授状的持有者，同时也是帝国的行商浪人王朝，哪怕是再多的法律条款，也无法扭曲这个事实！德莱夫斯塔家族永远都是行商浪人忠诚的支持者。”

languages.text: «Si me permite la interrupción, señora Vultur...». {n}Urbend Drivestem, gobernador de Dargonus, nervioso a todas luces por la presencia de los Arbitrator armados, alza la cabeza en un gesto altanero.{/n} «Le estamos muy agradecidos por organizar esta reunión...». {n}El énfasis que añade a esta última palabra deja claro que la presencia de los nobles en el Palacio es involuntaria.{/n} «Sin embargo, todo lo que ha tenido lugar aquí no cambia los hechos: la casa von Valancius posee la Patente de Comercio. ¡La casa von Valancius es una dinastía de Comerciantes Independientes, y ningún tipo de treta legal puede cambiar eso! La casa Drivestem es leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "If I might interrupt, Mistress Vultur..." {n}Urbend Drivestem, governor of Dargonus, visibly nervous at the sight of the armed Arbitrators, nevertheless raises his head haughtily.{/n} "We are much obliged to you for arranging this gathering..." {n}The emphasis on the last word leaves no doubt that the nobles' presence at the Palace is involuntary.{/n} "However, all that has now taken place here does not change the facts. House von Valancius holds the Warrant of Trade. House von Valancius is a Rogue Trader dynasty, and no amount of legal contortions will change that! House Drivestem is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Si me permite la interrupción, señora Vultur...». {n}Urbend Drivestem, gobernador de Dargonus, nervioso a todas luces por la presencia de los Arbitrator armados, alza la cabeza en un gesto altanero.{/n} «Le estamos muy agradecidos por organizar esta reunión...». {n}El énfasis que añade a esta última palabra deja claro que la presencia de los nobles en el Palacio es involuntaria.{/n} «Sin embargo, todo lo que ha tenido lugar aquí no cambia los hechos: la casa von Valancius posee la Patente de Comercio. ¡La casa von Valancius es una dinastía de Comerciantes Independientes, y ningún tipo de treta legal puede cambiar eso! La casa Drivestem es leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「お言葉を返すようですが、ヴァルター殿…」{n}ダルゴナス総督アーベンド・ドライブステンは、武装したアービトレイターたちを目の当たりにして明らかに緊張しているものの、誇らしげに頭を上げた。{/n}「この場を設けていただいたことには感謝いたします…」{n}「この場」という言葉に強調が込められており、貴族たちが自発的に司法宮に集まったわけではないことは明らかだった。{/n}「しかし、ここで何が起ころうとも、事実が変わるわけではありません。フォン・ヴァランシウス家は通商令状を保有しています。フォン・ヴァランシウス家はローグトレーダー王朝であり、どれだけ法を捻じ曲げようとも、それを覆すことはできません！ドライブステン家はローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓います」
languages.original_text: "If I might interrupt, Mistress Vultur..." {n}Urbend Drivestem, governor of Dargonus, visibly nervous at the sight of the armed Arbitrators, nevertheless raises his head haughtily.{/n} "We are much obliged to you for arranging this gathering..." {n}The emphasis on the last word leaves no doubt that the nobles' presence at the Palace is involuntary.{/n} "However, all that has now taken place here does not change the facts. House von Valancius holds the Warrant of Trade. House von Valancius is a Rogue Trader dynasty, and no amount of legal contortions will change that! House Drivestem is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「お言葉を返すようですが、ヴァルター殿…」{n}ダルゴナス総督アーベンド・ドライブステンは、武装したアービトレイターたちを目の当たりにして明らかに緊張しているものの、誇らしげに頭を上げた。{/n}「この場を設けていただいたことには感謝いたします…」{n}「この場」という言葉に強調が込められており、貴族たちが自発的に司法宮に集まったわけではないことは明らかだった。{/n}「しかし、ここで何が起ころうとも、事実が変わるわけではありません。フォン・ヴァランシウス家は通商令状を保有しています。フォン・ヴァランシウス家はローグトレーダー王朝であり、どれだけ法を捻じ曲げようとも、それを覆すことはできません！ドライブステン家はローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓います」

languages.text: "Müsaadenizle araya giriyorum Vultur Hanım..." {n}Dargonus valisi Urbend Drivestem, silahlı Yargıcılar arasında bulunmanın verdiği tedirginliğe rağmen mağrur bir şekilde başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bu toplantıyı tertip edişinize ziyadesiyle müteşekkiriz..." {n}Lafının son kelimelerine yaptığı vurgudan, soyluların Adalet Sarayı'na zorla getirildiği anlaşılıyor.{/n} "Lakin burada vuku bulmuş hiçbir şey, gerçekleri değiştirecek nitelikte değildir. Ticari Ruhsatname'nin hamili, von Valancius Hanesi'dir. Von Valancius Hanesi, bir Hür Tacir hanedanlığıdır ve siz yasaları eğseniz de bükseniz de bu hakikati değiştiremezsiniz! Drivestem Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e sadıktır."
languages.original_text: "If I might interrupt, Mistress Vultur..." {n}Urbend Drivestem, governor of Dargonus, visibly nervous at the sight of the armed Arbitrators, nevertheless raises his head haughtily.{/n} "We are much obliged to you for arranging this gathering..." {n}The emphasis on the last word leaves no doubt that the nobles' presence at the Palace is involuntary.{/n} "However, all that has now taken place here does not change the facts. House von Valancius holds the Warrant of Trade. House von Valancius is a Rogue Trader dynasty, and no amount of legal contortions will change that! House Drivestem is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

Ticari Ruhsatname'nin hamili, von Valancius Hanesi'dir. Von Valancius Hanesi, bir Hür Tacir hanedanlığıdır ve siz yasaları eğseniz de bükseniz de bu hakikati değiştiremezsiniz! Drivestem Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e sadıktır."
